title: HELP!   where to see replay?
body:
{{champion:18}}  I played with tristana 5-6 times...   
once I got penta kill  and  secondly i did a very great and unexpected escape ( I think so :D )  
So  I really want to see my replay
please help! 
I was playing in NORMAL PvP  ( if it is important :P ) 
And also   when I was playing I had no  replay programme..
I hope  U will help me....

replies.body:
Are you using the Beta Client? If so, you can find an option to download and then view the entire game replay from your *Match History*. You can find this under the **PROFILE** tab at the top of the client. Check out our [**Replay ProTips**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/234965248-Replays-FAQ-Pro-Tips) for more info on how the system works!

Let me know if you have any questions.

Hi, you have a few options:
_**Overwolf **_
It has a feature called Replay HUD. It can instant replay (screen capture video) anytime you want during the game as long as you press shift-F9 and I will record clips whenever you kill assist and die.

_**Baron Replay**_
This can replay the game in a way like you are an audience to your game.

Hope this helps. Cheers.
